mapper.select: SELECT A.EMPL_NUMB, C.DEPA_CODE, A.EMPL_NAME, A.LOGI_NAME, A.PASS_NAME, B.DEPA_NAME, C.EMPL_JKGB, C.EMPL_DUTY, C.IBSA_DATE, C.WORK_PLAC, (SELECT TONG_1NAM FROM ZMB WHERE TONG_CODE = 'OWN01') HEAD_NAME, (SELECT MAX(GRUP_NUMB) FROM ZMJ WHERE EMPL_NUMB = A.EMPL_NUMB) GRUP_NUMB FROM ZMC A, ZME B, INMAST C WHERE A.EMPL_NUMB = C.EMPL_NUMB AND C.DEPA_CODE = B.DEPA_CODE AND C.JEJK_GUBN = '1' AND A.LOGI_NAME = #{USER_ID} AND A.PASS_NAME = #{USER_PASSWORD}

SELECT LVL - 1 as "level", SUB as "image", DECODE(PROG_ID,' ',' ', PROG_ID) as "url", PROG_NAME AS "title", BCODE B_CODE FROM ( SELECT A.CHAR_CODE BCODE, NVL(B.TONG_1NAM,'미분류') BNAME, DECODE(NVL(B.TONG_PRES,1),0,1,NVL(B.TONG_PRES,1)) LVL, '2' SUB, A.PROG_IDEN PROG_ID, F.PROG_NAME, SUBSTR(B.TONG_CODE, 4,5) SEQ1, NVL(G.PROG_SEQ,999) SEQ2 FROM ZML A, ZMB B, ZMG G, ZMF F WHERE A.CHAR_CODE = B.TONG_CODE (+) AND G.CHAR_CODE = B.TONG_CODE AND A.PROG_IDEN = F.PROG_IDEN AND G.PROG_IDEN = A.PROG_IDEN AND A.USER_SABN = #{searchKeyword} AND SUBSTR(B.TONG_CODE, 4,2) = #{sysGubn} UNION SELECT A.CHAR_CODE BCODE, NVL(B.TONG_1NAM,'미분류') BNAME, DECODE(NVL(B.TONG_PRES,1),0,1,NVL(B.TONG_PRES,1)) -1 LVL, '1' SUB, ' ' PROG_ID, NVL(B.TONG_1NAM,'미분류') PROG_NAME, SUBSTR(B.TONG_CODE, 4,5) SEQ1, 0 SEQ2 FROM ZML A, ZMB B WHERE A.CHAR_CODE = B.TONG_CODE (+) AND A.USER_SABN = #{searchKeyword} AND SUBSTR(B.TONG_CODE, 4,2) = #{sysGubn} GROUP BY A.CHAR_CODE, NVL(B.TONG_1NAM,'미분류'),DECODE(NVL(B.TONG_PRES,1),0,1,NVL(B.TONG_PRES,1)), SUBSTR(B.TONG_CODE, 4,5)
UNION
SELECT A.CHAR_CODE BCODE, NVL(B.TONG_1NAM,'미분류') BNAME, DECODE(NVL(B.TONG_PRES,1),0,1,NVL(B.TONG_PRES,1)) LVL, '2' SUB, A.PROG_IDEN PROG_ID, F.PROG_NAME, SUBSTR(B.TONG_CODE, 4,5) SEQ1, NVL(G.PROG_SEQ,999) SEQ2 FROM ZML A, ZMB B, ZMG G, ZMF F, ZMI C, ZMJ D WHERE A.CHAR_CODE = B.TONG_CODE (+) AND G.CHAR_CODE = B.TONG_CODE AND A.PROG_IDEN = F.PROG_IDEN AND G.PROG_IDEN = A.PROG_IDEN AND A.USER_SABN = C.GRUP_NUMB AND C.GRUP_NUMB = D.GRUP_NUMB AND SUBSTR(B.TONG_CODE, 4,2) = #{sysGubn} AND D.EMPL_NUMB = #{searchKeyword} UNION SELECT A.CHAR_CODE BCODE, NVL(B.TONG_1NAM,'미분류') BNAME, DECODE(NVL(B.TONG_PRES,1),0,1,NVL(B.TONG_PRES,1)) -1 LVL, '1' SUB, ' ' PROG_ID, NVL(B.TONG_1NAM,'미분류') PROG_NAME, SUBSTR(B.TONG_CODE, 4,5) SEQ1, 0 SEQ2 FROM ZML A, ZMB B, ZMI C, ZMJ D WHERE A.CHAR_CODE = B.TONG_CODE (+) AND A.USER_SABN = C.GRUP_NUMB AND C.GRUP_NUMB = D.GRUP_NUMB AND D.EMPL_NUMB = #{searchKeyword} AND SUBSTR(B.TONG_CODE, 4,2) = #{sysGubn} GROUP BY A.CHAR_CODE, NVL(B.TONG_1NAM,'미분류'),DECODE(NVL(B.TONG_PRES,1),0,1,NVL(B.TONG_PRES,1)), SUBSTR(B.TONG_CODE, 4,5) ORDER BY SEQ1, SEQ2 )

SELECT BUSI_NUMB COMM_CODE, BUSI_NAME COMM_NAME FROM ABA WHERE WORK_PLAC = #{work_plac} AND BUSI_SDAY < #{busi_year} || '1231' AND BUSI_EDAY > #{busi_year} || '0101' AND BUSI_DEL != '1' ORDER BY BUSI_NUMB

SELECT A.WORK_PLAC COMM_CODE , B.CLTD_NAME COMM_NAME FROM INMAST A, ACCLCI B WHERE A.EMPL_NUMB = #{empl_numb} AND A.WORK_PLAC = B.WORK_PLAC UNION ALL SELECT A.GROW_PLAC COMM_CODE , B.CLTD_NAME COMM_NAME FROM INMAST A, ACCLCI B WHERE A.EMPL_NUMB = #{empl_numb} AND A.GROW_PLAC = B.WORK_PLAC
